"A.P.242/3/13": "...More filth has gathered here."
"...Hiyah!"
"...You are the Guardian."
"I am deeply sorry for involving you in my cleaning work. It should be a maid's duty..."
"At the very least... allow me to be of service. I shall offer you..."
"...My hospitality!"
"Well then... Shall we begin?"
"With that...we are finished!"
"...Allow me to thank you. I did not mean for you to be entangled in... this...?!"
"Oh goodness! My broom is ruined! I've done it again!"
"Aaah, I will surely receive another scolding from Maria... No, I mustn't be disheartened!"

"Forgive me for the delayed introduction...
My name is Lucotte."
"I am honored to make your acquaintance, brave Guardian!"
"What am I doing here? The new class \"Etoile\" has received approval..."
"I came here in the role of its representative, to test its practicality in battle."
"You would like to know more about Etoile? I am honored that you would take such an interest."
"Very well then, I will provide you with an explanation."
"Etoile, as you witnessed, is a close-range class whose forte is striking attacks."
"Its specialty is its ability to synergize. It provides beneficial effects to each allied class, allowing it to support everyone."
"And by strengthening its allies, Etoile becomes even stronger itself... Those are its fundamentals."
"...However, I am yet inexperienced, and needed to be rescued by you... I am terribly sorry."
"I have... inconvenienced you, haven't I...?"
"Are you hurt?"
"You didn't need my help."
"Not at all, thanks to you! Showing concern over a mere maid... Not only are you strong, but kind as well."
"That is not true! I had overestimated my own abilities. You have my heartfelt gratitude."
"Just what one would expect from a Guardian. Such strength and kindness... How inspiring! How commendable!"
"I believe you have the makings of the ideal employer... The ideal Master!"
"I do not currently have a Master... Therefore, I shall serve you hereafter!"
"I am still inexperienced... But I look forward to working for you, Master!"
